monsterSenses: Senses blindsight 30 ft. (blind beyond this radius)
monsterSpecials: False Appearance. While the violet fungus remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an ordinary fungus.
monsterActions: Multiattack. The fungus makes 1d4 Rotting Touch attacks.
Rotting Touch. Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. Hit: 4 (1d8) necrotic damage.
